PoGo has so much potential but awfully optimized. My previous phone got its mainframe burnt, made my phone overheat a lot, even with battery saver on. The game drops a lot fps. so many unskippable animations, i spend 45+ mins of my day outside watching the animations, not actually playing. Red and blue team players are toxic. Camping the gyms, their numbers are bigger than yellow team. there should be 2 teams, not 3. or people shouldn't be able to occupy same gym twice too soon need a cooldown

you pay real money for remote passes and half the time the game crashes between end of raid or max battle and then you just wasted your money and they don't do anything about it. and then you try to add stops through the wayfarer system and they reject it because it doesn't match criteria, meanwhile you drive by 3 stops a day that definitely don't meet the criteria, so basically the game itself and the system to improve it are both bad

If you play for a while the game errors out and most gyms will just display "gym under construction" forcing you to restart the game a lot and when it's time sensitive you miss out on things. Same thing with eggs, it just takes over your screen and if you were trying to complete another task which the egg hatching sequence takes priority and takes an eternity to complete some times making you miss time critical things. It would be better if the eggs just alerted you that they're ready to hatch.
